mainText:
I had not know Mr.Jobs, but I'm in deep sorrow. I consider that he was and
he still is a real hero, a real Superman. The legendary man who through
the life's difficulties and challenges of fate were moving to his dreams
and never gave up. Not many people can achieve as many as Steve did.
Almost each person on the Earth from children to adult at some point owe
to Steve. We would never know where we would be today without Apple or
Pixar. At what progress level the whole humanity would be?
Steve Jobs - the man whose name must be put at textbooks.
Steve Jobs - MAN among men.
Steve Jobs - The man whose name should never be forgotten.
author: Sergiy
